name: Daily Sudoku - Brain Training
description:
Classic Sudoku for beginners and advanced players, 1099 puzzles, NO ADs.

Amazing features:

· Automatically save game progress
· Auto-Check duplicates to avoid repeating numbers in a row, column or block
· Take notes to keep track of possible numbers
· Highlight numbers
· Daily practice record


Daily Sudoku, play Sudoku daily!

Enjoy!
